thread.title: Executive departures point to deeper trouble at Yahoo
thread.title_full: Executive departures point to deeper trouble at Yahoo - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Executive departures point to deeper trouble at Yahoo
text:
Photo: Michel Euler, AP Marissa Mayer, CEO of Yahoo, has wanted to hire top talent to help turn around the company, but a wave of departures is putting a crimp in that plan. Marissa Mayer, CEO of Yahoo, has wanted to hire top talent to help...
An important part of Marissa Mayer’s plan to turn around Yahoo — hiring top talent — seems to be crumbling, as more managers have joined a crowd of at least a dozen who have left this year. Marissa Mayer, CEO of Yahoo, has wanted to hire top talent to help turn around the company, but a wave of departures is putting a crimp in that plan. An important part of Marissa Mayer’s plan to turn around Yahoo — hiring top talent — seems to be crumbling, as more managers have joined a crowd of at least a dozen who have left this year.
